properties.description: Our main business aims are to make life better for everyone but especially those affected by memory loss and who feel isolated. We do not play music in our cafes to reduce noise levels. We are dog friendly for anyone wanting to bring their four legged fr We are a calm and welcoming community cafe open to the public. properties.description: We cater for the whole community - this house is your house. There are book clubs, writing groups, craft sessions, support groups, English conversation sessions, help with technology, free activities for children and young people, and much more. Storyhouse is a cultural hub in the centre of Chester with two theatres, a cinema, library, and restaurant. There is study space, free WiFi access, and community groups to join. We can also signpost you to other support services you might need.
